common.name: StopCOVID NI
common.networkError: Connection issue. Please check your internet connection and try again.

tryAgain.title: Please try again
tryAgain.description:
Sorry, that didn’t work properly.
Please check that you have a network connection and try again.

exposureNotifications.title: ‘Exposure Notifications’ are required
exposureNotifications.instructionsios:
1. Please ensure ‘COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’ are switched on for this device
2. Re-open this app
exposureNotifications.instructionsandroid:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘Google > COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’
3. Switch on ‘Exposure Notifications’
4. Re-open this app
exposureNotifications.turnOn: Please ensure ‘COVID-19 Exposure Notifications’ are switched on for this device

bluetoothNotifications.title: Bluetooth is required
bluetoothNotifications.instructions:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘Bluetooth’
3. Switch on ‘Bluetooth’
4. Re-open this app

sendNotifications.title: ‘App Notifications’ are required
sendNotifications.instructions:
1. Go to device ‘Settings’
2. Select ‘{{name}}’
3. Switch on ‘Notifications’
4. Re-open this app

resultCodeMoreInfo.instructions: App users you have been in close contact with will be told that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 but won’t know who it was.

clearContacts.instructions: Are you sure you want to clear your close contact alerts?

ageRequirement.notice: You must be 18 or older to use this app

underAlert.title: You must be 18 or older to use this app
underAlert.body: If you are under 18, please remove this app from your device

locationConfirmation.notice: Only people living in Northern Ireland can use this app.
locationConfirmation.description: To be able to put a COVID-19 test result into the app, you must be linked to the NI lab test result registry.
locationConfirmation.question: Are you from NI?

noAlert.title: Only people living in Northern Ireland can use this app.
noAlert.body: You are advised not to try to use this app, and are encouraged to use an app that will work for you, in your area.

view.title: Why use this contact tracing app?
view.main: Using it will help all of us in NI by stopping or slowing the spread of COVID-19. This supports the health services, and helps us avoid another lockdown.
view.text: By using this app you are really helping to save lives. **Thank you.**

view.title: How does this app work?
view.textBell: **If you are in close contact** with an app user who has added a positive COVID-19 test result to their app, this app will notify you. **You won’t know who, when or where.**
view.textUnion: **If you test positive for COVID-19** you can add that result to this app. This will notify other app users that you have been in close contact with. **This app will never reveal your identity or location.**

view.title: How is my privacy protected?
view.usage: The app can also collect data on how people use it, to help us make it better. If you’re OK with this please turn on Share Usage Data.
view.textKey:
If you test positive for COVID-19 you will get a code by SMS text message from **'HSCresult'**. When you put that code into this app you will be asked to share the random IDs that your phone has been swapping with other app users over the last 14 days. If you agree, these 'diagnosis keys' will allow us to tell those people that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

 # 

**We will never ask you to reply to the SMS text message.** Please ignore any message asking you to reply or send information.
view.textKey1: So that you can use this app when travelling abroad we will securely share 'diagnosis keys' with other countries. This also means that apps used by visitors from those countries will work here.
view.textEye:
**This app will never track your identity or location**, but it does collect some data. We will know the number of app users, the number of people in NI who enter ‘HSCresult’ codes, and the number of people in NI who are told that they have been exposed to COVID-19.

 # 

**We need this data to prove that the app works,** and to get it approved as a medical device.

view.title: Are you happy to continue?
view.textBell: To protect your privacy, and tell you as soon as possible if you’ve been exposed to COVID-19, we use **automated processing**. This means that no human is involved in the process, and some people are uncomfotable with that. To be able to use this app you will be asked to turn on 'exposure notifications'. By doing this you are agreeing to the automated processing.
view.confirmation: Do you agree to continue and start using this app?
view.tc: If you tap ‘Yes’ you are accepting the Terms and Conditions.
view.optOut: **You can choose to opt out at any time.** To do this select ‘Leave’ in ‘Settings’ in this app.

accessibility.yesHint: Agree to continue and start using this app

confirm.title: Are you sure?
confirm.description: If you refuse to share data you will not be able to use the app.

ios.title: Please update Apple iOS to use this app
ios.text1: You need to do this to use the ‘Exposure Notification Service’ created by Apple to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

android.title: Please update Google Play Services to use this app
android.text1: You need to do this to use the ‘Exposure Notification Service’ created by Google to help make apps like this work and stop COVID-19.

view.title: Last few steps...
view.item1: Next, you will be asked for your permission to enable contact tracing technologies and notifications for this app.
view.item2: Please give your permission so that the app can work properly.

message.standard: You can close this app and it will keep working
message.inactive: Tracing is not active, so this app won’t work

dashboard.isolationCompleteSupplemental: The app has returned to normal usage
dashboard.thanks: Thank you for helping save lives
tour:
**Thank you.**

The app is all set up and tracing is on
Help your community by inviting others to join and take part
Go here to find out more about how the app works
Tested positive? Add your result and help protect others
dashboard.alternateTourStart: Tracing is **not active** at the moment but you can fix this later

symptomChecker.message:
**Not feeling well?**
Check if you have COVID-19 symptoms and book a test

tracing.heading: Tracing
tracing.body: If you are in close contact with an app user who has tested positive for COVID-19 and added that result to their app, this app will notify you.
tracing.message: You can close this app and tracing will keep working. If you want to stop tracing and opt out select ‘Leave’ from the ‘Settings’ menu.
tracing.inactiveMessage: Tracing is not active, so this app won’t work. To fix this go to your device ‘Settings’ and **turn on**:
tracing.inactiveMessage1: If you want to stop tracing and opt out select ‘Leave’ from the ‘Settings’ menu in this app.
tracing.notificationBody: You have been in **close contact with someone who has COVID-19**

community.heading: Share & Protect
community.body: Contact tracing is more effective when more people use this app. Invite others to download the app and help protect our community.

about.heading: About this App
about.link: Read more about this app and the technology used

closeContactNotification.title: IMPORTANT: Close Contact Alert
closeContactNotification.description: You have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19. Tap here to open the app and find out what to do.

enableExposure.title: Enable COVID-19 Exposure Notifications from "{{name}}"
enableExposure.description: This is needed so that this app can understand when your phone is near another phone with this app.

sendNotifications.title: "{{name}}" would like to Send You Notifications
sendNotifications.description: Notifications may include alerts, sounds and icon badges.These can be configured in Settings.

closeContact.title: Action Required
closeContact.body1: This is because you have been in close contact with someone who has COVID-19 and could be infected.
closeContact.body2: By self-isolating you will protect others and help prevent another lockdown. Thank you for doing this.
closeContact.notWell:
**Not feeling well?**

Check your symptoms and book a test

tests.heading: Add Test Result
tests.content: If you test positive for COVID-19 you can add that result to this app and alert others. This will never reveal your identity or location.
tests.modalContent: App users you have been in close contact with will be told that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19 but won’t know who it was
tests.permissionError: We have not uploaded your keys as you did not grant permission.
tests.uploadError: An error occurred trying to upload

code.error: There was an error validating the code. Please try again.

add.assistanceMessage: You will be contacted by the Public Health Authority Contact Tracing team. Please tell them that you have been using this app, and that your code expired.
add.heading: Add Test Result Code
add.description: You should only enter a Test Result Code if you have tested positive for COVID-19
add.uploadOnlyDescription:
Test result code was already added.
You just need to submit it.

result.heading: Thank you.
result.label1: You must self-isolate for {{duration}} days following your positive test result.
result.label2: Your identity will **NOT** be shared. Your personal data or any identifiable information will **NOT** be shared.
result.label2dontShare: Your random IDs have **NOT** been shared. App users you have been in close contact with will **NOT** be notified that they have been exposed to someone with COVID-19.

view.heading: Add Test Result
view.description: You have verified that you have tested positive for COVID-19. You should self-isolate for 7 days from the start of your symptoms.
view.tellMore: I’ve tested positive. Tell me more about self-isolation.

clearData.message: Want to get rid of your close contact alert?

action.label: Clear Close Contact Alert
action.hint: Buttons clears your Clear Close Contact Alert and all exposure service data on your device

clearData.confirmText: Are you sure you want to clear all your Close Contacts?
clearData.error: There was an error clearing your Close Contacts. Please try again.

leave.title: Leave
leave.body:
Thank you for helping to fight COVID-19. We’re sorry to see you go. When you tap ‘I want to leave’ we will remove all data stored by the app from your device.

Random IDs created or collected by Exposure Notification Services cannot be removed by this app. If you want to remove these, do this through your device ‘Settings’.

control.label: I want to leave
control.hint: Exits the app and deletes all data

confirm.title: Leave
confirm.text: Are you sure you want to leave?

leave.error: There was an error clearing your data. Please try again or contact us.

usage.title: Usage Data
usage.body:
This app collects some data on how people use it. This helps us make it better, and improve our contact tracing processes.

This data is only collected with your consent and we do not use any third parties to collect it. None of this data could be used to identify you.
